00040 #ifndef _uirectangle_cpp
00041 #define _uirectangle_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "uirectangle.h"
00044 #include "uimanager.h"
00045 #include "uilayer.h"
00046 #include "world.h"
00047 #include "eventmanager.h"
00048 
00049 #include "internalGorilla.h.cpp"
00050 
00051 namespace phys
00052 {
00053     namespace UI
00054     {
00055         Rectangle::Rectangle(Vector2 Position, Vector2 Size, UILayer* Layer)
00056             : Parent(Layer),
00057               MouseHover(false),
00058               RelPosition(Position),
00059               RelSize(Size)
00060         {
00061             Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00062 
00063             Vector2 Window = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00064             GRectangle = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createRectangle((Position * Window).GetOgreVector2(),(Size * Window).GetOgreVector2());
00065         }
00066 
00067         Rectangle::~Rectangle()
00068         {
00069             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyRectangle(GRectangle);
00070         }
00071 
00072         void Rectangle::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00073         {
00074             GRectangle->SetVisible(Visible);
00075         }
00076 
00077         bool Rectangle::IsVisible()
00078         {
00079             return GRectangle->IsVisible();
00080         }
00081 
00082         void Rectangle::Show()
00083         {
00084             GRectangle->Show();
00085         }
00086 
00087         void Rectangle::Hide()
00088         {
00089             GRectangle->Hide();
00090         }
00091 
00092         bool Rectangle::CheckMouseHover()
00093         {
00094             if(!GRectangle->IsVisible())
00095                 return false;
00096             Vector2 MouseLoc = Manager->GetGameWorld()->GetEventManager()->GetMouseCoords();
00097             if(GRectangle->intersects(MouseLoc.GetOgreVector2()))
00098             {
00099                 MouseHover = true;
00100             }else{
00101                 MouseHover = false;
00102             }
00103             return MouseHover;
00104         }
00105 
00106         bool Rectangle::GetMouseHover()
00107         {
00108             return MouseHover;
00109         }
00110 
00111         void Rectangle::SetBackgroundColour(ColourValue& Colour)
00112         {
00113             GRectangle->background_colour(Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00114         }
00115 
00116         void Rectangle::SetBackgroundSprite(const String& Name)
00117         {
00118             Gorilla::Sprite* GSprite = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->_getSprite(Name);
00119             GRectangle->background_image(GSprite);
00120         }
00121 
00122         void Rectangle::SetBorder(Real Width, ColourValue& Colour)
00123         {
00124             GRectangle->border(Width, Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00125         }
00126 
00127         void Rectangle::NoBorder()
00128         {
00129             GRectangle->no_border();
00130         }
00131 
00132         void Rectangle::SetPosition(Vector2 Position)
00133         {
00134             RelPosition = Position;
00135             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00136             GRectangle->position((CurrDim * RelPosition).GetOgreVector2());
00137         }
00138 
00139         Vector2 Rectangle::GetPosition()
00140         {
00141             return RelPosition;
00142         }
00143 
00144         void Rectangle::SetActualPosition(Vector2 Position)
00145         {
00146             GRectangle->position(Position.GetOgreVector2());
00147         }
00148 
00149         Vector2 Rectangle::GetActualPosition()
00150         {
00151             Vector2 Pos(GRectangle->left(), GRectangle->top());
00152             return Pos;
00153         }
00154 
00155         void Rectangle::SetSize(Vector2 Size)
00156         {
00157             RelSize = Size;
00158             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00159             GRectangle->width(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00160             GRectangle->height(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00161         }
00162 
00163         Vector2 Rectangle::GetSize()
00164         {
00165             return RelSize;
00166         }
00167 
00168         void Rectangle::SetActualSize(Vector2 Size)
00169         {
00170             GRectangle->width(Size.X);
00171             GRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00172         }
00173 
00174         Vector2 Rectangle::GetActualSize()
00175         {
00176             Vector2 Pos(GRectangle->width(), GRectangle->height());
00177             return Pos;
00178         }
00179 
00180         void Rectangle::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00181         {
00182             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00183             switch(Priority)
00184             {
00185                 case UI::RP_Low:
00186                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00187                     break;
00188                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00189                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00190                     break;
00191                 case UI::RP_High:
00192                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00193                     break;
00194                 default:
00195                     break;
00196             }
00197             GRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00198         }
00199 
00200         UI::RenderPriority Rectangle::GetRenderPriority()
00201         {
00202             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GRectangle->RenderPriority();
00203             switch(RP)
00204             {
00205                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00206                     return UI::RP_Low;
00207                     break;
00208                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00209                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00210                     break;
00211                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00212                     return UI::RP_High;
00213                     break;
00214                 default:
00215                     break;
00216             }
00217             return UI::RP_Medium;
00218         }
00219     }//UI
00220 }//phys
00221 
00222 #endif
